summary: In Victorian London, a Crime Novelist and his Wife fake their disappearance in order to hide from an uptight Anglican Bishop who is leading a campaign against the "evils" of crime fiction.
cast: Louis Jouvet|Françoise Rosay|Michel Simon|Jean-Pierre Aumont|Jean-Louis Barrault|Nadine Vogel|Pierre Alcover|Henri Guisol|Agnès Capri|René Génin|Ky Duyen|Marcel Duhamel|Jane Loury|Madeleine Suffel|Jenny Burnay|Claudye Carter|Annie Carriel|Sinoël|Yves Deniaud|Fabien Loris|Frédéric O'Brady|Max Morise|Pierre Prévert|Guy Decomble|Jean Marais|Maurice Marceau|Franck Maurice|Raymond Pélissier|Foun-Sen|Margot Capelier
title: Un drama singular
